content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. For example, ensure you have coal before trying to insert it into a furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into a full chest
- Check the inventory of the target chest before inserting items to ensure there is enough space. If the chest is full, clear some space before attempting to insert more items.

### Errors when inserting incorrect item types
- Verify the type of item you are inserting matches the expected input for the target entity. For instance, ensure you are inserting iron ore into a furnace expecting iron ore, not coal.
